revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Microsoft |model=MN-100 |revision= |asin=B007VWLK3G;CA;, |manuf_country=China |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=WG3005C |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |est_release_date=09/19/2002 |fcc_date=05/31/2002 |fcc_id=HEDACC300568 |pcb_id=142300500600A |type=router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel, reverse gender core |pwr_pol=true |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM5106 (X01-03620-01) |cpu1_cspeed=75 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=28F160C3BC70 |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W986432DH-8 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pad header |serial=yes,, 10-pin header |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:50:F2 }} {{TagLine|Broadband Networking Wired Base Station}} :''Broadband Networking 10/100 Ethernet Wired Base Station'' ''[[Accton]]'' is the presumed manufacturer of this unit - they made the rest of Microsoft's :networking line-up from this era. The device label also seems to have an Accton P/N. See also the [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/mn100/ Microsoft MN-100] on the ''Hardware Recycling Initiative'' website. :Per their site, the CPU X01-03620-01 ''appears to be ADM5106 compatible''. *[[ADMtek]] ADM5106 @75MHz (ARM7TDMI, OS ThreadX), eq. [[Conexant]] CX84200-11 The power adapter included with the device is a ''Foxlink'' FA-4A030-1 (12VDC, 500mA). :It has a barrel connector with a reversed gender core (that is, it has a pin). ===See also=== *[[Microsoft MN-100]] - Ethernet Wired Base Station • [http://hri.sourceforge.net/hw/mn100/ SF] :CPU: M$ X01-03620-01 (ARM7TDMI based, no-MMU) :Flash: [[Intel]] 28F160C3BC70 (2MB) :RAM: [[Winbond]] W986432DH-8 (8MB) *[[Microsoft MN-110]] - [[ADMtek]] ADM8511 • USB - ETH *[[Microsoft MN-120]] - [[ADMtek]] AN985B • PCMCIA - ETH *[[Microsoft MN-500]] - Broadband Wireless Base Station :CPU: M$ X01-03620-01 (ARM7TDMI based, no-MMU) :Flash: ''SST'' SST39VF160-70 (2MB) :RAM: ''Micron'' MT48LC2M32B2TG-6F (8MB) :FCC ID: HEDACC300568 - [[Accton]] WG3005C-68 :• Microsoft MN-500 + MN-510 (USB) = MN-610 Kit *[[Microsoft MN-700]] - Wireless Router (FCC ID: C3KMN700) *[[Microsoft MN-740]] - Wireless Bridge (FCC ID: C3KMN740) *[[Accton WG3005B1-17]] - [[Accton]] WG3005B1 :CPU: [[ADMtek]] ADM5106, WLAN: AT76C502A/RF3000 :FCC ID: HEDWG3005B1-17 (Accton) 2002 *[[3Com OfficeConnect 3CRWE51196]] - [[Accton]] WG3005B :CPU: [[ADMtek]] ADM5106, WLAN: ISL3873B/ISL3685 :FCC ID: HEDWG3005BACC (Accton) 2002 *[[3Com OfficeConnect 3CRWE52196]] - [[Accton]] WG3005B1-32 :CPU: [[Conexant]] CX84200-11 (@75MHz) :FCC ID: HED3CRWE52196 (Accton) 2002 *[[Belkin F5D6231-4 v1]] - [[Accton]] WG3005C1-AK :CPU: [[Conexant]] CX84200-11 (@75MHz) :FCC ID: K7SF5D6231-4 *[[SMC SMC7004VWBR v1]] - [[Accton]] WG3005B1-17 :CPU: [[Conexant]] CX84200-11 (@75MHz) :FCC ID: HEDWG3005B1-17, HEDACC2632WV2 ==Images== __NOTOC__
